# description

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the column.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Getting a description of an untyped column

- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the column shown in a playground.
- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the column for debugging.
- **customMirror**: A view of the column for Xcode Playgrounds and lldb.
